gpt_comment: Paris is set for a sunny day with an average temperature of 27.3°C, peaking at 32°C and dipping as low as 22°C. Meteoblue's forecast aligns with this, predicting highs of around 85°F (29°C). It's a perfect day for an afternoon at the Jardin du Luxembourg, maybe you'll even spot a monkey at the Menagerie!
